name: Oik 5
detailed_description:
Casual physics puzzle. The player's goal is keep the blue block on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.

Each object in the game has a unique property depending on its color, You must choose the correct order of action to solve the puzzle.
Puzzles go from easy to hard, some of them challenge your brain!

This game is a great way to train your brain.

- Nice music
- Beautiful design
- Intuitive interface

Music by Trauerbaum

Credits

"Oik 5" powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
